price: On reče: “Gospodaru moj, ja sam narod svoj i noću i danju, doista, pozivao,
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي دَعَوۡتُ قَوۡمِي لَيۡلٗا وَنَهَارٗا

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī daʿawtu qawmī laylan wanahāran
